bibl.title: [Proposals] 1794 Oct. 31, Knoxville, Tennessee [to] David Henley / John Chisholm
bibl.author: Chisolm, John
bibl.note: This document is a proposal from John Chisolm to David Henley, agent for the Department of War, dated October 31, 1794. The document provides specific details for supplying rations for the use of troops in service at the rivers in the territory south of the Ohio.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.p: Proposials made by John Chisolm to David Henley Esquir Agent for the war Department__ For Supplying such Rations, in the Territory South of the ohio as shall be requred for the use of the Troops in Service from the first day of january to the thirty first Day of December Bouth dayes Inclusively in the __ Year 1795__
1st At any place or Placess from the mouth of the River Tennessey to Occochoppo or Bear Creek on said River two cents pr Ration__
2nd At any place or placess from the mouth of the River Cumberland On the said River to Nashville 4 Cents
any place or placess within thirty miles of__ Nashville, to the southward westward or Northward there of 12 Cents__
6th At any place or placess between Bledsoes lick and Nashvill 8 Cents__
7th At any place or placess from Bledsoes lick to the Crossing of the cumberland River along the New Trace 4 Cents
8th At at or near the great salt lick & at the crossing place over cumberland River 2 C near New Trace12 cents
9th At any place or placess along the New Trace from the crossing of cumberland River to the mouth of__Clynch River 8 Cents__
10th At the mouth of Clynch River 12 Cents that is at the Block houses at the mouth of Clynch

11th At any place or placess On the Northwestern Frontiars of washinton & Hambleton Districts in the Territory of South of the ohio from the Block houses at the mouth of clynch to the Virginia line 8 Cents
12th At any place or placess On the Southern frontier of washenton or Hambleton Districts 12 Cents
13th At any place or placess in the Territory South of the ohio not herein mentioned 10 Cents
div1.closer:
Knoxville october 31st 1794 John Chisolm
Collonel David Henley
Knoxville_
31 October 1794
John Chisom
Proposals for
the Ration Contract
